Left 4 Dead является, пожалуй, лучшей игрой про зомби-апокалипсис. Во время игры полностью погружаешься в атмосферу страха и ужаса, все происходящее на экране воспринимается как очередной фильм от Джорджа Ромеро, а себя ощущаешь в нем главным героем. Эта игра должна быть в коллекции у каждого любителя постапокалиптики!

Left for Dead Review 

(Story)
Who is patient zero? You play as one of four survivors in various movies (campaigns) about a zombie outbreak in North America.  The movies have a specific order and tell the story of the survivors as they make their way to the south. 

(Gameplay)
L4D is a first person shooter that is all about awareness.  Listen for audio cues to know what your about to go up against and always keep your head moving.  All four survivors play exactly the same way with their only difference being their appearance/voice.  Their banter ads charm to the game and you will likely find a favorite.  They also alert you to enemy presence, making sound important.  The special infected require you to adopt different strategies and use all you tools to overcome them.  You carry one primary weapon with your secondary being the iconic 45.  You can also carry a throwable weapon for crowd control and pills for temporarily boosting your health.  Much of the tension in this game comes from scavenging for these items.  Should you go without a molotov or should you take the time to look for one?  Campaigns are made up of two to five chapters, each taking about 15-20 minutes to complete. Every campaign ends with a finale, where the survivors must defend themselves from two waves of infected as they wait for rescue.

There is a multiplayer component to the game with online matchmaking and LAN capabilities.  Play through every campaign with three other people or compete in versus.  In versus, four play as survivors and four play as the special infected.  The survivors play the game like campaign, except now the only special infected that spawn are those controlled by the other team.  In this asymetric style of verus (due to the abilities of the infected), coordination is key for both teams.

(Design)
Envrionments are mostly static save for the occasional particle effects.  The game is dark to fit the tone and often times you will need to use your flashlight to aim.  Lighting effects are very good though, some of the best in a valve game in my opinion.  Enemy animations are great and the ambient sounds really ratchet up the scare factor.  There is nothing quite like your first playthrough of No Mercy.  Weapons sound great and reload animations are good as well.  

(Final Comments)
When asked what Left 4 Dead to buy, people often answer Left 4 Dead 2.  However, Left 4 Dead has a special place in my heart because of it's LAN party friendliness, which is where I first played it.  I recommend this game but if you want all that Left 4 Dead has to offer and more, you should consider buying the sequel.

Left 4 Dead была моей одной из первых и любимых игр на PC. В первый раз я сыграл её с ещё 3 друзьями. И это был лучший co-op в моей жизни. Разрабы я люблю вас! Всё просто шикарно.

-Офигенный персонажи
-Интересные карты
-Видно ноги
-Один из лучших co-op игр
-Один из лучших игр про зомби-апокалипсис
-И конечно же "Режиссёр". Кто не знает это такой бот, который спаунет всех врагов, оружие, патроны, пайпы, молотовы, ставит места где начинаются волны.

Я никогда не устану играть в эту игру. Одно из лучших творений человечества.

Если вы щас скажите: "Кaкой 1 Left 4 Dead, графика говно, есть 2 и там есть ближние оружие".
Теперь я вам отвечу.Во 2 части убрали ноги, приблизили камеру, что дико не удобно, сделали убогих персонажей, все карты коридорные, "Режиссёра"  убили, ещё и добавили переделанные        
карты из 1 части. А ближние оружие убило весь баланс. Но 2 части есть один плюс, это VersusMode. Кто не знает это режим где и зомби, и люди игроки. И лучше он только тем, что там зомби больше. 
Поэтому берите 1 часть, и конечно же ещё 3 друзей.

Kampaň
V tomto módu se hraje síťová hra, zde hraje minimálně jeden živý hráč a další tři postavy, které jsou buď ovládány lidmi nebo počítačem. Přeživší postupně prochází mapami a musí spolupracovat, aby přežili.

Hra jednoho hráče
Klasický Singleplayer, ve hře hraje jeden živý hráč a ostatní tři postavy jsou ovládány počítačem.

Versus mod
Zde je hra rozdělena na dva teamy pro celkem osm hráčů po síti. To znamená po čtyřech v každém z teamů. Ve versus modu hrají živí hráči proti živým hráčům. Jeden team je lidský (Survivors) a hraje proti druhému teamu speciálních zombie (Boss nebo Special infected). Po dokončení mapy, nebo zabití všech Survivors se teamy vymění.

Survival mod
Survival mod byl přidán v dubnu 2009 v zadarmo stažitelném Survival Packu. Přeživší se zde snaží přežít co nejdéle nekonečným řadám zombií. Přeživší zůstávají po celou dobu na jedné mapě, po smrti všech postav, hra končí a hráči jsou odměněni medaili dle času přežití.

Les + : Simplicité , Gameplay unique et fluide , Tactique possible , Map custom par centaines , Les difficultés , L'originalité qui permet de ne jamais être lasser de ce jeu et ces zombie que l'on adore replacer six pieds sous terre .

Les - : J'y réfléchie encore et aucun points n'est négatifs pour moi .

Note : 95/100

PS : Vivement le 3 , Oui vous avez bien vue le chiffre 3 !! Il est désormais en developpement

[h1][i]В настоящее время уже никого не удивишь, написав обзор на данную игру. Но всё равно поделюсь своими мнениями и впечатлениями. В своё время Left 4 Dead произвёл фурор в игровой индустрии. Динамичный геймплей, режим кооператива, шустрые зомби, красивая картинка, которая и по сей день выглядит достойно. Настолько запоминающиеся локации, что спустя много лет, запустив игру, начинаешь видеть любимые места, где, когда то часами с друзьями проводил время. Играется и сегодня, причём с удовольствием. Лично мне нравится больше именно эта часть, чем вторая. Она более мрачная, ну и пусть что меньше миссий, чем во второй,- пофигу. Очень удачно реализовали режим от первого лица, который отличается от достойного наследника. Т.к в своё время, игру разрабатывали совсем другие ребята, а не Valve. Если Вы по какой либо причине упустили это творение, - срочно исправляйте ошибку ).

9/10[/i][/h1]

Keep your heads up, and pop those pills! Left 4 Dead is a game originally developed by Turtle Rock Studios and later purchased and produced by Valve Software. the game is based on Counter-Strike: Source in a sense. you have the choice between 4 survivors (hence the name), each with their own personalities. a gameplay mechanic that has become common among games like this is a "downed" mechanic. if your health drops to zero, you don't immediately die. instead, you are downed. when downed, you are trapped on the ground with only your pistols with 300 temporary health until someone helps you. there are about 12 weapons in the game divided between 1 Pistol, 1 SMG, 2 Shotguns, 1 Assault Rifle, 1 Sniper Rifle, 2 Throwables, 3 Carryables, and 1 Mounted Minigun. there are 4 campaigns to traverse through (although 2 were added later for a total of 6), each with a completely different setting. there are also Special Infected in addition to the Common Infected in a similar manner as Resident Evil. there's the Boomer, a large fat zombie that vomits on you. it's vomit attracts a horde of infected. the Hunter is a zombie in a blue hoodie often crouching down. he pounces on you and tears you apart until someone gets him off. the Smoker is best known for the smoke he explodes into when he does. he has a long rope-like tongue he uses to drag his victims towards him. if he can't get a victim towards him, they may hang from the neck or become pinned against an object. the Tank, well, when you hear the word Tank, you probably think big and tough. this infected is the definition of giant zombie. he can outrun you at times, he can smash objects flying towards survivors, he can kill them very easily if downed, and he sends survivors flying towards their deaths if they are on a high place. he can also rip a giant piece of concrete out of the ground and throw it at survivors if he wants. his health is also pretty high. the odd infected out is the Witch. the Witch is a female zombie with silver hair and torn olive drab clothing. she is the zombie that makes loud crying noises. she is capable of instantly downing a survivor and can shred them quickly if nobody helps them. there are different settings and difficulties to choose from as well. i dare you to play Expert with just Pistols! hah! anyway, I hope my review helps. enjoy playing with your friends!

~ Cons

No barricading like in Zombie Panic Source!

I only just started playing this game a week ago, and I already have 42 hours on record. It is an excellent game. It is one-of-a-kind in that it has no learning curve, a great, replayable set of storylines, witty characters, and forced cooperation. 

The game is different in that it turns the play into a movie that you create. There are movie posters showing the cast (the players) in an action shot, just like any real movie would have. There are ending credits, and it has various ways to make it feel like a movie in game (You learn about many of them in the developer commentary). 

The first thing you do is jump into a game with 3 other people and die. A lot. But if your team mates help you, you become proficient rather quickly. There is no tutorial or level one. You join a game that experienced players may or may not be able to handle, and you learn to play. They don't coddle you. 

You can't just shoot at anything that moves, either. You have to think before going rambo on the horde. There are special infected, such as boomers and witches, that often screw you over when you shoot them. It introduces a level of thinking to an already strategic game.

The game combines the great things in singleplayer games with those of multiplayer games. It has a plot. Well, many plots. They are all separate, but they loosely combine to create the overall storyline of the game. However, it is completely unnecessary to play them in order. They exist as standalone campaigns that many people never assosiate to eachother.

The game has almost endless replayability, as The Director, the games master AI, makes it different every time. There are different dialogues the characters may have, many humorous or relatable. In one small scene involving the characters talking to a person in a church, 25 different dialogues can play out. The characters have strong personalities, and you really get to know them. It all feels very close to home.

The game forces cooperation on the players. If one person makes a bad move, everyone's ass can get burnt (quite literally in some cases). Also, there are many things that happen, such as being incapacitated or dangling off a ledge that require a team mate's help, or you will die. No questions asked. 

The game also has a lot of content, with 6 different campaigns (Thanks to the Sacrifice DLC) in both campaign and versus mode. They are not small, and are split up into many stages. There are also 20(?) survival maps that you can play. This all combines for nearly endless play time.

The game also rewards curiosity. Players who explore may find new supplies to help them on their way.

You can leave your computer without leaving the game. You just go idle, and a bot takes over your character while you let your pet in or burn your hands getting your last pop-tart from the toaster.

Many people will tell you just to buy Left 4 Dead 2. While I have not played my copy yet, many other arguments I've heard are that Left 4 Dead 2 changes many of the original maps, and that it ports in the versus versions of the maps, not the campaign versions. This leads to a very different feel. Also, it includes all the left 4 dead content - which means more weapons that may ruin the feel, and more special infected which may ruin the game for some. Also, I assume the achievements wouldn't be there. I've also heard that the characters aren't as good or lively.

Either way, it's a great game that I will always recommend to my friends. Sorry for the long review, but this game just stands out from the rest to me, and I had to try and get new players in. My only complaint is that not enough people play. So you can be the change! Buy this game, it will be worth your while. I promise.

Before I start let me just say that I've only played the single player campaign so I can't comment on the multiplayer. Now, most games usually have a small time period where they introduce the characters and the setting and such... This game does not do that, this game throws you into zombie infested locations and tells you to somehow cross the map without being brutally murdered. Sometimes I do wish this game had a more Story-Driven... you know, Story mode. But that is about the only thing I can complain about.
THE GOOD
~Very Intense
~Great Enemies
~Awesome Level Design
~You Can See Your Feet!!
THE BAD
~No Real Story
~Limited Weapons
THE FINAL OPINION
Overall, this game is still great, even in 2014. It may lack a Borderlands level of weapons, And may not have the most detailed story, But L4D is probably the best zombie game ever made. 8.75/10
